content: **gauge ** color band 7 sts = 3 14 row = 4 in pat octagon rnds 1-4 = 6 eyes rnds 1- 5 = 6 point to point center rnds 1-5 = 6 patterned like a double wedding ring quilt in tlc 4 skeins 2316 winter white ca 5 skeins 2615 lt celery cb 6 skeins 2916 island cc patterns wt1647 and lw2698 are identical except for the yarn used wt1647 uses tlc essentials and lw2698 uses red heart supersaver the red heart pattern can be found here 1 1 https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-wedding-ring-quilt/rhc0502-022195m html
